title: Conor McGregor makes bold Prince Harry and Meghan Markle comparison
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Royal Family stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Conor McGregor has compared himself and girlfriend Dee Devlin to royal power couple Prince Harry and Meghan Markle .

The former two-weight UFC champion has been out of the limelight having not fought since being choked out by Khabib Nurmagomedov last October.

But the Irishman posted a photo of himself and Dee with the caption, "Harry and Megan [sic] who?".

McGregor and long-term partner Dee have been together for over a decade and have two children, son Conor Jr and daughter Croia.

The Dubliner, meanwhile, is expected to provide an update on his future at a press conference in Moscow on Thursday.

(Image: thenotoriousmma/Instagram)

The Irish UFC star has been teasing a return to the Octagon, having last fought over a year ago against Russian Nurmagomedov .

McGregor is due in Moscow on October 24, where he will discuss his immediate plans in the country, with suggestions this will be primarily to promote his own brand of Proper Twelve whiskey.

However organisers of the event - book makers Parimatch - teased that the 31-year-old could divulge information about his return to the sport.

The press release read: "McGregor will meet with reporters on October 24. This is the first such event involving McGregor in Russia.

(Image: PA)

"Perhaps he will make statements about his imminent return to the octagon."

The Notorious star has been active on social media this week, posting several updates to show he is in Russia, and ended up trading blows with Nurmagomedov on Twitter .

Following claims by UFC president Dana White that Nurmagomedov was "the man now", McGregor responsed in typical fashion.

He wrote: "Who’s not the man? Your man had that marquee event did he? More like an event in a marquee. A tent in the f****** sand it was. Keep spoofing to your self horse. Jock strap sniffer championships."
description: Conor McGregor has been out of the limelight having not fought since being choked out by Khabib Nurmagomedov last October
